item.title: Are we the last generation of Network Engineers?
item.description: Automation is today a word that can be both scaring and exciting at the same time. The scary part is often related to the question: will robots steal my job? Federico Pistono says that’s ok. We read articles about how many jobs will not exist anymore soon, and sometimes how new jobs will be create to support automation. The most advanced analysts try to predict how a society can survive with massive unemployment.
